EmailTemplate.subject: Demand Letter Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your recent Small Claims order.
We have sent the demand letter to your defendant on your behalf. In 10 days from now, we will prepare your claim for filing with the court. If you settle with the defendant or would like to proceed with your claim before the 10 days have passed, please contact us by replying to this email, or feel free to call us toll-free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone} {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
We truly appreciate your business and look forward to serving your future legal document needs.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
